name: Ar-Rahman Learning Center
mission: ORGANIZE, ARRANGE AND PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HUMANITARIAN SERVICE IN THE FIELD OF EDUCATION, HEALTHCARE, MEDICAL RESEARCH AND SOCIAL WELFARE THROUGH NET-WOR...
theoryOfChange: By providing authentic knowledge through native speakers and structured curriculum, the institute aims to help students live by the Quran and strengthen their faith.
zakatClaimEvidence: The Cause IQ page for Ar-Rahman Learning Center in Chicago, IL, describes its activities as providing religious knowledge, daily prayer, weekly sermons, congregational prayer, and classes, as well as organizing book fairs and marriage ceremonies. There is no explicit mention of accepting zakat donations, dedicated zakat funds, or campaigns on this page. (Source: https://www.charitynavigator.org/ein/853547280#financials)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Limited match due to weaker results and/or higher uncertainty; review methodology details before deciding.

components.improvement_suggestion: Expand services to underserved populations or geographies with limited nonprofit coverage.

score_details.score_summary: AR-Rahman Learning Center Inc shows moderate alignment and limited impact (minor risk deductions applied).

zakat.claim_evidence: The Cause IQ page for Ar-Rahman Learning Center in Chicago, IL, describes its activities as providing religious knowledge, daily prayer, weekly sermons, congregational prayer, and classes, as well as organizing book fairs and marriage ceremonies. There is no explicit mention of accepting zakat donations, dedicated zakat funds, or campaigns on this page. (Source: https://www.charitynavigator.org/ein/853547280#financials)

all_citations.claim: The organization provides humanitarian services in education and healthcare and offers Quran and Arabic language classes.
AR-Rahman Learning Center Inc reported total revenue of $4,559,370 and a program expense ratio of 84.1%.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a moderate score due to its strong financial efficiency and high program spending, though its overall rating is tempered by low data confidence and limited impact evidence.
areas_for_improvement: Limited external data regarding long-term impact metrics
Low data confidence score suggests a need for increased transparency

dimension_explanations.alignment: The charity shows medium alignment for Muslim donors through its focus on global education and religious instruction, such as Quran and Arabic classes [1]. While it serves a critical cause, the lack of comprehensive public data affects its overall alignment score [2].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization demonstrates a high program expense ratio of 84.1%, indicating that the majority of its $4,559,370 revenue is directed toward its educational and humanitarian programs [2]. However, the impact score is limited by a lack of third-party verification and specific cost-per-beneficiary data [1].

baseline_narrative.headline: AR-Rahman Learning Center Inc provides affordable humanitarian services through specialized educational programs and social welfare initiatives.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 84.1% dedicated to core services
Exceptional fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised
Substantial working capital reserves of 785.8 months
baseline_narrative.summary: Based in New York, AR-Rahman Learning Center Inc focuses on providing affordable humanitarian services in education, healthcare, and medical research [1]. The organization reported a total revenue of $4,559,370 and operates programs including Quran and Arabic language classes [2].
